alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 04 at 9:01AM CDT until April 08 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo and Hale Counties. .Heavy rainfall expected on Tuesday will produce rises along the Black Warrior River Basin. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, Pasture and wood lands begin to flood. Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 83.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Thursday morning to a crest of 90.4 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
